important_words.example: Today, we're going to practice listening to everyday English conversations.
There will be 3 native voices playing at a time.
Try to listen to them and see if you can understand them.
I do, but only electronic cigarettes.
What is your favorite Japanese food?
I'm looking for my wallet and my smartphone.
If you liked this lesson, please like the video.
If you haven't subscribed to the channel yet, please subscribe to the channel.

important_phrases.example: we're going to practice listening to everyday English conversations.

important_phrases.meaning: また次回お会いしましょう
